established under this Section&nbsp;6. Any election as to a portion of such
fees shall be expressed as a percentage and the same percentage shall be
applied to all such fees regardless of the calendar year in which earned or to
all deferred fees earned in designated calendar years, as specified by the
Director. A Director may make no more than one notional investment election
under this Section&nbsp;6.l in any calendar year. All such elections may apply
only to deferred fees for which an election has not previously been made and
shall be irrevocable.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Any Director may, by written notice filed with the
Secretary of the Company, elect to have all or any portion of deferred fees
earned subsequent to the date such notice is filed credited to a Stock Account
established under this Section&nbsp;6. Fees covered by such election shall be
credited to such account at the end of each calendar quarter in, or for which,
such fees are earned. Such election may be revoked or modified by such
Director, by written notice filed with the Secretary of the Company, as to
deferred fees to be earned in calendar years subsequent to the calendar year
such notice is filed, but shall be irrevocable as to deferred fees earned prior
to such year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Deferred fees credited to a Stock Account under Section&nbsp;6.1
shall be converted to Common Stock Units by dividing the deferred fees so
credited by the closing price of common shares of the Company on the date the
notice of election under Section&nbsp;6 is received by the Company (or the next
business day, if there are no sales on such date) as reported on the New York
Stock Exchange Composite Reporting System. Deferred fees credited to a Stock
Account under Section&nbsp;6.2 shall be converted to Common Stock Units by
dividing the deferred fees so credited by the closing price of common shares of
the Company as of the last business day of the calendar quarter for which the
credit is made, as reported on the New York Stock Exchange Composite Reporting
System.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">Each Common Stock Unit shall be credited with (or
adjusted for) the same cash and stock dividends, stock splits and other
distributions and adjustments as are received by or applicable to one common
share of the Company. All cash dividends and other cash distributions credited
to Common Stock Units shall be converted to additional Common Stock Units by
dividing each such dividend or distribution by the closing price of common
shares of the Company on the payment date for such dividend or distribution, as
reported by the New York Stock Exchange Composite Reporting System.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">6.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font color="black" style="color:windowtext;">The value of the Common Stock Units credited each
Director shall be paid to the Director in cash on the dates specified in Section&nbsp;4.3
(or, if applicable, Section&nbsp;4.5). The amount of each payment shall be
determined by multiplying the Common Stock Units payable on each date specified
in Section&nbsp;4.3 (or, if applicable, Section&nbsp;4.5) by the closing price
of common</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">8</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='8',FILE='C:\JMS\105830\09-10266-1\task3530548\10266-1-kg-01.htm',USER='105830',CD='May  2 01:40 2009' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">shares of the Company on the day prior to the payment date
(or the next preceding business day if there are no sales on such date), as
reported by the New York Stock Exchange Composite Reporting System.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">SECTION&nbsp;7.<br>
MISCELLANEOUS</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Each
Director or former Director entitled to payment of deferred fees hereunder,
from time to time may name any person or persons (who may be named contingently
or successively) to whom any deferred Director&#146;s fees earned by him and payable
to him are to be paid in case of his death before he receives any or all of
such deferred Director&#146;s fees.&#160; Each
designation will revoke all prior designations by the same Director or former
Director, shall be in a form prescribed by the Company, and will be effective
only when filed by the Director or former Director in writing with the
Secretary of the Company during his lifetime. If a deceased Director or former
Director shall have failed to name a beneficiary in the manner provided above,
or if the beneficiary named by a deceased Director or former Director dies
before him or before payment of all the Director&#146;s or former Director&#146;s
deferred Directors&#146; fees, the Company, in its discretion, may direct payment of
the remaining installments required by Section&nbsp;4.3 to either:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">any
one or more or all of the next of kin (including the surviving spouse) of the
Director or former Director, and in such proportions as the Company determines;
or</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">the
legal representative or representatives of the estate of the last to die of the
Director or former Director and his last surviving beneficiary.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">The person or persons to whom any deceased Director&#146;s
or former Director&#146;s deferred Directors&#146; fees are payable under this Section&nbsp;will
be referred to as his &#147;beneficiary.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Establishment
of the Plan and coverage thereunder of any person shall not be construed to
confer any right on the part of such person to be nominated for reelection to
the Board of Directors of the Company, or to be reelected to the Board of
Directors.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Payment
of deferred Directors&#146; fees will be made only to the person entitled thereto in
accordance with the terms of the Plan, and deferred Directors&#146; fees are not in
any way subject to the debts or other obligations of persons entitled thereto,
and may not be voluntarily or involuntarily sold, transferred or assigned. When
a person entitled to a payment under the Plan is under legal disability or, in
the Company&#146;s opinion, is in any way incapacitated so as to be unable to manage
his financial affairs, the Company may direct that payment be made to such
person&#146;s legal representative, or to a relative or friend of such person for
his benefit. Any payment made in accordance with the preceding sentence shall
be in complete discharge of the Company&#146;s obligation to make such payment under
the Plan.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Any
action required or permitted to be taken by the Company under the terms of the
Plan shall be by affirmative vote of a majority of the members of the Board of
Directors then in office.</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='9',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Notwithstanding
anything in the Plan to the contrary, any amounts under the Plan that were
earned and vested before January&nbsp;1, 2005 (as determined in accordance with
Code Section&nbsp;409A) with respect to a Director who retired before January&nbsp;1,
2005 (&#147;Grandfathered Amounts&#148;) shall be subject to the terms and conditions of
the Plan as administered and as in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2004.&#160; Amendments made to the Plan pursuant to this
amendment and restatement or otherwise shall not affect the Grandfathered
Amounts unless expressly provided for in the amendment.&#160; The terms and conditions applicable to the
Grandfathered Amounts are set forth in Exhibit&nbsp;A attached hereto.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">7.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">To
the extent applicable, it is intended that the Plan comply with the provisions
of Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.&#160; The
Plan will be administered and interpreted in a manner consistent with this
intent, and any provision that would cause the Plan to fail to satisfy Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code will have no force and effect until amended to comply therewith
(which amendment may be retroactive to the extent permitted by Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code).&#160; Notwithstanding anything
contained herein to the contrary, for all purposes of this Plan, a Director
shall not be deemed to have had a termination of service as a Director until
the Director has incurred a separation from service as defined in Treasury
Regulation &#167;1.409A-1(h)&nbsp;and, to the extent required to avoid accelerated
taxation and/or tax penalties under Code Section&nbsp;409A and applicable
guidance issued thereunder, payment of the amounts payable under the Plan that
would otherwise be payable during the six-month period after the date of
termination shall instead be paid on the first business day after the
expiration of such six-month period, plus interest thereon, at a rate equal to
the rate specified in Section&nbsp;9.8 (to the extent that such interest is not
already provided to the participant under Section 9.10), from the respective
dates on which such amounts would otherwise have been paid until the actual
date of payment.&#160; In addition, for
purposes of the Plan, each amount to be paid and each installment payment shall
be construed as a separate identified payment for purposes of Section&nbsp;409A
of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">SECTION&nbsp;8.<br>
AMENDMENT AND DISCONTINUANCE</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">While the Company expects to continue the Plan, it must necessarily
reserve, and does hereby reserve, the right to amend or discontinue the Plan at
any time; provided, however, that any amendment or discontinuance of the Plan
shall be prospective in operation only, and shall not affect the payment of any
deferred Directors&#146; fees theretofore earned by any Director, or the conditions
under which any such fees are to be paid or forfeited under the Plan. Any
discontinuance of the Plan by the Company shall comply with the requirements of
Section&nbsp;409A of the Code.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;text-transform:none;">SECTION&nbsp;9.<br>
ALTERNATE PAYMENT OF FEES</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;text-transform:uppercase;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.1</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">By
written notice filed with the Secretary of the Company prior to each calendar
year beginning after December&nbsp;31, 1988, a Director may elect to receive
all or a portion of his fees earned in the following calendar year in
accordance with the provisions of Section&nbsp;9.&#160; An election under this Section&nbsp;9.1 shall
become irrevocable as of December&nbsp;31 of the calendar year prior to the
year in which such monthly and meeting fees will be earned (or, in the case of
a new Director, on the 30</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:6.5pt;position:relative;top:-3.0pt;">th</font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&#160;day following the Director&#146;s first
participation in the Plan and all plans that</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">10</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='10',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">would be aggregated with the Plan pursuant to Treasury Regulation
&#167;1.409A-1(c)(2)(i), <u>provided</u>, that the compensation subject to such
election relates solely to services performed after the date of such election).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.2</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">If
payment of a Director&#146;s fees is made pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.1, such fees
shall not be deferred and a portion of such fees shall be paid currently in
cash for the Director directly to a &#147;Grantor Trust&#148; established by the
Director, provided such trust is in a form which the Company determines to be
substantially similar to the trust attached to this plan as Exhibit&nbsp;B; and
the balance of the fees shall be paid currently in cash directly to the
Director, provided that the payment made directly to the Director shall equal
the aggregate federal, state and local individual income taxes attributable to
the fees paid pursuant to this Section&nbsp;9.2 (determined in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.14).&#160; In no event shall such fees be paid to the
Grantor Trust or directly to the Director later than the last day of the &#147;applicable
2 &#189; month period&#148;, as such term is defined in Treasury Regulation &#167;
1.409A-1(b)(4)(i)(A).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.3</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">The
Company will establish and maintain four separate accounts in the name of each
Director who has made an election under Section&nbsp;9.1 as follows: a &#147;Pre-Tax
Fee Account&#148;, an &#147;After-Tax Fee Account&#148;, a &#147;Pre-Tax Stock Account&#148; and an &#147;After-Tax
Stock Account&#148; (collectively, the &#147;Accounts&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">The
Pre-Tax Fee Account shall reflect any fees paid in cash to a Director
(including amounts deposited to a Director&#146;s Grantor Trust) pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.2,
and interest to be credited to a Director pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.8.&#160; The After-Tax Fee Account shall also reflect
such amounts but shall be maintained on an after-tax basis.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">The
Pre-Tax Stock Account shall reflect the total amount of fees converted to Common
Stock Units pursuant to Section&nbsp;6 and any adjustments made pursuant to
that Section&nbsp;and Section&nbsp;9.9. The After-Tax Stock Account shall also
reflect such amounts but shall be maintained on an after-tax basis.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">The
Accounts established pursuant to this Section&nbsp;9.3 are for the convenience
of the administration of the Plan and no trust relationship with respect to
such Accounts is intended or should be implied.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.4</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As of the end of each calendar year, the Company shall adjust
each Director&#146;s Pre-Tax Fee Account as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST,
charge, in any year in which the Director is entitled to receive a distribution
from his or her Grantor Trust, an amount equal to the distribution from the fee
account maintained thereunder that would have been made to the Director if the
aggregate amounts paid according to Section&nbsp;9.2 had instead been deferred
under Section&nbsp;3;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">NEXT,
credit an amount equal to any fees for that year, not converted to Common Stock
Units, that are paid to the Director (including the amount deposited in the
participant&#146;s Grantor Trust) according to Section&nbsp;9.2; and</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">11</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='11',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-autospace:none;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FINALLY, credit an amount equal to the Interest earned for
that year according to Section&nbsp;9.8.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.5</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As
of the end of each calendar year, the Company shall adjust each Director&#146;s
After-Tax Fee Account as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST,
charge, in any year in which the Director is in receipt of a benefit
distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the
distribution that would have been made to the Director if the aggregate amounts
paid according to Section&nbsp;9.2 had instead been deferred under Section&nbsp;3,
multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a fraction, the numerator of which is the balance in
the Director&#146;s After-Tax Fee Account as of the end of the prior fiscal year and
the denominator of which is the balance of the Director&#146;s Pre-Tax Fee Account
as of that same date;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">NEXT,
credit an amount equal to the fees not converted to Common Stock Units that are
paid that year to the Director directly to the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust
according to Section&nbsp;9.2; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FINALLY,
credit an amount equal to the After-Tax Interest earned for that year according
to Section&nbsp;9.8.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.6</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As of the end of each calendar year, the Company shall adjust
each Director&#146;s Pre-Tax Stock Account as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST, charge, in any year in which the Director is entitled
to receive a distribution from his or her Grantor Trust, an amount equal to the
distribution that would have been made to the Director if the aggregate amount
of fees paid according to Section&nbsp;9.2 had instead been deferred under Section&nbsp;3
and the adjustments had been made under Section&nbsp;6;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;   </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">NEXT, credit an amount equal to any fees for that year that
are converted to Common Stock Units and paid to the Director (including the
amount deposited in the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust to the stock account
maintained thereunder) according to Section&nbsp;9.2; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-autospace:none;text-indent:1.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FINALLY,
credit an amount equal to the Book Value Adjustments to be made for that year
according to Section&nbsp;9.9.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.7</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As
of the end of each calendar year, the Company shall adjust each Director&#146;s
After-Tax Stock Account as follows:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FIRST,
charge, in any year in which the Director is entitled to receive a distribution
from his or her Grantor Trust, an amount equal to the product of (i)&nbsp;the
distribution that would have been made to the Director if the aggregate amounts
paid according to Section&nbsp;9.2 had instead been deferred under Section&nbsp;3
and the adjustments had been made under Section&nbsp;6, multiplied by (ii)&nbsp;a
fraction, the numerator of which is the balance in the Director&#146;s After-Tax
Stock Account as of the end of the prior fiscal year</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">12</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='12',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">and the denominator of which is the balance of the Director&#146;s
Pre-Tax Stock Account as of that same date;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">NEXT, credit an amount equal to the fees converted to Common
Stock Units that are paid that year to the Director directly to the Director&#146;s
Grantor Trust and allocated to the stock account maintained thereunder
according to Section&nbsp;9.2; and</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(c)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">FINALLY,
credit an amount equal to the Book Value Adjustments to be made for that year
according to Section&nbsp;9.9.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.8</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As
of the end of each calendar year, a Director&#146;s Pre-Tax Fee Account shall be
credited with interest (&#147;Interest&#148;) at the following rate:</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(i)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">the
average of the &#147;prime rate&#148; of interest published by the Wall Street Journal
(Mid-West Edition) or comparable successor quotation service on the first
business day of January&nbsp;and the last business day of each month of the
fiscal year;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(ii)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">plus two hundred twenty-five (225) basis points.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 2.0in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">(b)</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:9.0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As
of the end of each calendar year, a Director&#146;s After-Tax Fee Account shall be
credited with the amount of Interest set forth above, multiplied by the
aggregate of the federal, state and local individual income tax rates
determined in accordance with subsection 9.14 (the &#147;After-Tax Interest&#148;).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt 1.5in;text-indent:-.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.9</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">As
of the end of each calendar year, a Director&#146;s Pre-Tax Stock Account and
After-Tax Stock Account shall be adjusted as provided in Section&nbsp;6.4, to
the extent applicable, and shall also be adjusted to reflect the increase or
decrease in the fair market value of the Company&#146;s common stock determined in
accordance with Section&nbsp;6.5, except that (i)&nbsp;any reference to the
payment date in such Section&nbsp;shall mean December&nbsp;31 of the applicable
calendar year for purposes of this Section, and (ii)&nbsp;adjustments to the
After-Tax Stock Account shall be made on an after-tax basis.&#160; Such adjustments shall be referred to as &#147;Book
Value Adjustments.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.10</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">In addition
to any fees paid to a Director&#146;s Grantor Trust under Section&nbsp;9.2 during
the year, the Company shall also make a payment to a Director&#146;s Grantor Trust
(a &#147;Guaranteed Rate Payment&#148;) for each year in which the Grantor Trust is in
effect.&#160; The Guaranteed Rate Payment
shall equal the excess, if any, of the Director&#146;s Net Interest Accrual (as
defined below) over the net earnings of the Director&#146;s deferred account
maintained under the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust for the year, and shall be paid
within the thirty (30) days beginning April&nbsp;1 of the following calendar
year.&#160; A Director&#146;s Net Interest Accrual
for a year is an amount equal to the After-Tax Interest credited to the
Director&#146;s After-Tax Fee Account for that year in accordance with Section&nbsp;9.8(b).</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.11</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">In addition
to the fees paid under Section&nbsp;9.2 during the year and the Guaranteed Rate
Payment described above, the Company shall also make a payment to a Director&#146;s
Grantor</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">13</font></p>

<div style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='13',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p align="center" style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Trust (a &#147;Guaranteed Principal Payment&#148;) for each year in
which the Grantor Trust is in effect, to be credited to the stock account
maintained thereunder.&#160; The &#147;Guaranteed
Principal Payment&#148; shall equal the excess, if any, of 75 percent of the balance
of the Director&#146;s After-Tax Stock Account on December&nbsp;31 over the balance
in the stock account maintained under the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust as of that
same date. For the calendar year in which the last installment distribution is
made from the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust (meaning, the year that is X years
following the year of the event triggering the payments, where X is the same
number of years served by the Director), the payment made under this Section&nbsp;9.11
shall equal the excess, if any, of 100 percent of the balance of the Director&#146;s
After-Tax Stock Account over the balance in the stock account maintained under
the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust as of that same date.&#160; Any Guaranteed Principal Payment required
under this Section&nbsp;9.11 shall be made within the thirty (30) days
beginning April&nbsp;1 of the following calendar year.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.12</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">Each
Director&#146;s Grantor Trust assets shall be invested solely in the instruments
specified by investment guidelines established by the Committee.&#160; Such investment guidelines, once established,
may be changed by the Committee, provided that any change shall not take effect
until the year following the year in which the change is made and provided
further that the instruments specified shall be consistent with the provisions
of Section&nbsp;3(b)&nbsp;of the form of Grantor Trust attached hereto as Exhibit&nbsp;B.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.13</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">In addition
to the fees paid under Section&nbsp;9.2 and the payments provided by Section&nbsp;9.10
and 9.11, each Director (or, if the Director is deceased, the beneficiary
designated under the Director&#146;s Grantor Trust) shall be entitled to a Tax Gross
Up payment for each year in which the Grantor Trust is in effect. The &#147;Tax
Gross Up&#148; shall equal: (a)&nbsp;the amount necessary to compensate the Director
(or beneficiary) for the net increase in his or her federal, state and local
income taxes as a result of the inclusion in the Director&#146;s (or beneficiary&#146;s)
taxable income of the income of his or her Grantor Trust and any Guaranteed
Rate and Guaranteed Principal Payments for that year; plus (b)&nbsp;an amount
necessary to compensate the Director (or beneficiary) for the net increase in
the taxes described in (a)&nbsp;above as a result of the inclusion in his or
her taxable income of any payment made pursuant to this Section&nbsp;9.13.&#160; Any Tax Gross-Up payments shall be made no
later than the end of the calendar year in which the Director remits the
related taxes.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">9.14</font><font size="1" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" color="black" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">For
purposes of Section&nbsp;9, a Director&#146;s federal income tax rate shall be
deemed to be the highest marginal rate of federal individual income tax in effect
in the calendar year in which a calculation under this Section&nbsp;is to be
made and state and local tax rates shall be deemed to be the highest marginal
rates of individual income tax in effect in the state and locality of the
Director&#146;s residence on the date such a calculation is made, net of any federal
tax benefits without a benefit for any net capital losses. Notwithstanding the
preceding sentence, if a Director is not a citizen or resident of the United
States, his or her income tax rates shall be deemed to be the highest marginal
income tax rates actually imposed on the Director&#146;s benefits under this Plan or
earnings under his or her Grantor Trust without a benefit for any net capital
losses.</font></p>

<p style="color:black;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" color="black" face="Times New Roman" style="color:windowtext;font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">9.15</font><font size="1" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:8.5pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </font><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">If a portion of a Director&#146;s fees have
been paid to a Grantor Trust pursuant to Section&nbsp;9.2, then those fees and
earnings thereon shall be paid to him or her from the Grantor Trust in the
order in which they were earned (i.e., the fees for the earliest year of
service as a Director will be the first fees distributed from the Grantor
Trust(s), the fees for the next earliest year of service as a Director will be
paid on the anniversary of the payment of the first</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">14</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='14',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">installment, etc.)&#160; The distribution of a Director&#146;s fees shall
continue until all fees to which the Director is entitled to receive under the
Plan shall have been paid in accordance with the terms of the Grantor Trust(s).</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">15</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='15',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;A</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:bold;">ABBOTT
LABORATORIES NON-EMPLOYEE DIRECTORS&#146; FEE PLAN</font></b></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">[Abbott
Laboratories Non-Employee Directors&#146; Fee Plan, as amended, as filed as Exhibit&nbsp;10.1
to the Abbott Laboratories Current Report on Form&nbsp;8-K dated February&nbsp;17,
2006.]</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\pgeetha\09-10266-1\task3531286\10266-1-kg-03.htm',USER='105264',CD='May  2 11:23 2009' -->



<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">
<div style="font-family:Times New Roman;">

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Exhibit&nbsp;B</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="font-weight:bold;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><b><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">IRREVOCABLE GRANTOR TRUST AGREEMENT</font></b></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">THIS RESTATED AGREEMENT, made this
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; day of
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
2008, by and between
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
of &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(the
&#147;grantor&#148;), and The Northern Trust Company located at Chicago, Illinois, as
trustee (the &#147;trustee&#148;),</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WITNESSETH THAT:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the grantor has established a trust
known as the &#147;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grantor
Trust&#148;, dated&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;,
to hold certain benefits received by the grantor under the Abbott Laboratories
Non-Employee Directors&#146; Fee Plan, as it may be amended from time to time; and</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">WHEREAS, the grantor, with the consent of the
administrator of the referenced trust, desires to amend the agreement creating
the referenced trust (&#147;trust agreement&#148;) in many respects and believes the
trust agreement, as so amended, would be easier to understand if restated.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">NOW, THEREFORE, the grantor amends the trust
agreement by substituting for it and all prior amendments the following
provisions which set forth all of the terms and conditions relating to the
administration, investment and distribution of the trust property after this
date:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="font-size:10.0pt;margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE I</font></u><br>
<u>Introduction</u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-1.&#160;&#160; <u>Name</u>.&#160; This agreement and the trust hereby evidenced
(the &#147;trust&#148;) may be referred to as the &#147;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Grantor
Trust.&#148;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-2.&#160; <u>The
Trust Fund</u>.&#160; The &#147;trust fund&#148; as at
any date means all property then held by the trustee under this agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-3. <u>Status of the Trust</u>.&#160; The trust shall be irrevocable.&#160; The trust is intended to constitute a grantor
trust under Sections 671-678 of the Internal Revenue Code, as amended, and
shall be construed accordingly.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-4. <u>The Administrator</u>.&#160; Abbott Laboratories (&#147;Abbott&#148;) shall act as
the &#147;administrator&#148; of the trust, and as such shall have certain powers, rights
and duties under this agreement as described below.&#160; Abbott will certify to the trustee from time
to time the person or persons authorized to act on behalf of Abbott as the
administrator.&#160; The trustee may rely on
the latest certificate received without further inquiry or verification.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">I-5. <u>Acceptance</u>.&#160; The trustee accepts the duties and
obligations of the &#147;trustee&#148; hereunder, agrees to accept funds delivered to it
by the grantor or the administrator, and agrees to hold such</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='',FILE='C:\JMS\105830\09-10266-1\task3530548\10266-1-kg-05.htm',USER='105830',CD='May  2 01:54 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">funds (and any proceeds from
the investment of such funds) in trust in accordance with this agreement.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE II<br>
Distribution of the Trust Fund</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">II-1.&#160; <u>Separate
Accounts</u>.&#160; The administrator shall
maintain two separate accounts under the trust, a &#147;deferred account&#148; and a &#147;stock
account.&#148; Funds delivered to the trustee shall be allocated between the
accounts by the trustee as directed by the administrator.&#160; As of the end of each calendar year, the
administrator shall charge each account with all distributions made from such
account during that year; and credit each account with its share of income and
realized gains and charge each account with its share of expenses and realized
losses for the year.&#160; The trustee shall
be required to make separate investments of the trust fund for the accounts,
and may not administer and invest all funds delivered to it under the trust as
one trust fund.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">II-2.&#160; <u>Distributions
Prior to the Grantor&#146;s Death</u>.&#160;
Principal and accumulated income shall not be distributed from the trust
prior to the grantor&#146;s termination of service as a Director of Abbott (the
grantor&#146;s &#147;settlement date&#148;); provided that, each year the administrator may
direct the trustee to distribute to the grantor a portion of the income of the
trust fund for that year, with the balance of such income to be accumulated in
the trust.&#160; The administrator shall
inform the trustee of the grantor&#146;s settlement date.&#160; Thereafter, the trustee shall distribute the
trust fund to the grantor, if then living, in a series of annual installments,
commencing on the first day of the month next following the later of the
grantor&#146;s settlement date or the date the grantor attains age 65 years.&#160; The administrator shall inform the trustee of
the number of installment distributions and the amount of each installment
distribution under this paragraph II-2, and the trustee shall be fully
protected in relying on such information received from the administrator.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">II-3.&#160; <u>Distributions
After the Grantor&#146;s Death</u>.&#160; The
grantor, from time to time may name any person or persons (who may be named
contingently or successively and who may be natural persons or fiduciaries) to
whom the principal of the trust fund and all accrued or undistributed income
thereof shall be distributed in a lump sum or, if the beneficiary is the grantor&#146;s
spouse (or a trust for which the grantor&#146;s spouse is the sole income
beneficiary), in installments, as directed by the grantor, upon the grantor&#146;s
death.&#160; If the grantor directs an
installment method of distribution to the spouse as beneficiary, any amounts
remaining at the death of the spouse beneficiary shall be distributed in a lump
sum to the executor or administrator of the spouse beneficiary&#146;s estate.&#160; If the grantor directs an installment method
of distribution to a trust for which the grantor&#146;s spouse is the sole income
beneficiary, any amounts remaining at the death of the spouse shall be
distributed in a lump sum to such trust.&#160;
Despite the foregoing, if (i)&nbsp;the beneficiary is a trust for which
the grantor&#146;s spouse is the sole income beneficiary, (ii)&nbsp;payments are
being made pursuant to this paragraph II-3 other than in a lump sum and (iii)&nbsp;income
earned by the trust fund for the year exceeds the amount of the annual
installment payment, then such trust may elect to withdraw such excess income by
written notice to the trustee.&#160; Each
designation shall revoke all prior designations, shall be in writing and shall
be effective only when filed by the grantor with the administrator during the
grantor&#146;s lifetime.&#160; If the grantor fails
to direct a method of distribution, the distribution shall be made in a lump
sum.&#160; If the grantor fails to designate a
beneficiary as provided above, then on the grantor&#146;s death, the trustee shall</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">2</font></p>

<div style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;"><hr size="3" width="100%" noshade color="#010101" align="left"></div>

</div>
<!-- SEQ.=1,FOLIO='2',FILE='C:\JMS\105830\09-10266-1\task3530548\10266-1-kg-05.htm',USER='105830',CD='May  2 01:54 2009' -->


<br clear="all" style="page-break-before:always;">


<div>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">distribute the balance of the
trust fund in a lump sum to the executor or administrator of the grantor&#146;s
estate.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">II-4.&#160; <u>Facility
of Payment</u>.&#160; When a person entitled
to a distribution hereunder is under legal disability, or, in the trustee&#146;s
opinion, is in any way incapacitated so as to be unable to manage his or her
financial affairs, the trustee may make such distribution to such person&#146;s
legal representative, or to a relative or friend of such person for such person&#146;s
benefit.&#160; Any distribution made in
accordance with the preceding sentence shall be a full and complete discharge
of any liability for such distribution hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">II-5.&#160; <u>Perpetuities</u>.&#160; Notwithstanding any other provisions of this
agreement, on the day next preceding the end of 21 years after the death of the
last to die of the grantor and the grantor&#146;s descendants living on the date of
this instrument, the trustee shall immediately distribute any remaining balance
in the trust to the beneficiaries then entitled to distributions hereunder.</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;text-decoration:underline;"><u><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">ARTICLE III<br>
Management of the Trust Fund</font></u></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;page-break-after:avoid;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">III-1.&#160;
<u>General Powers</u>.&#160; The
trustee shall, with respect to the trust fund, have the following powers,
rights and duties in addition to those provided elsewhere in this agreement or
by law:</font></p>

<p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:.5in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<table border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" width="90%" style="border-collapse:collapse;margin-left:.5in;width:90.0%;">
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">(a)</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="92%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:92.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">Subject to
  the limitations of subparagraph (b)&nbsp;next below, to sell, contract to
  sell, purchase, grant or exercise options to purchase, and otherwise deal
  with all assets of the trust fund, in such way, for such considerations, and
  on such terms and conditions as the trustee decides.</font></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.72%;">

  <td width="92%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:92.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To retain in
  cash such amounts as the trustee considers advisable; and to invest and
  reinvest the balance of the trust fund, without distinction between principal
  and income, in common stock of Abbott Laboratories, or in obligations of the
  United States Government and its agencies or which are backed by the full
  faith and credit of the United States Government or in any mutual fund,
  common trust fund or collective investment fund which invests solely in such
  obligations; and any such investment made or retained by the trustee in good
  faith shall be proper despite any resulting risk or lack of diversification
  or marketability.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">

  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To deposit
  cash in any depositary (including the banking department of the bank acting
  as trustee) without liability for interest, and to invest cash in savings
  accounts or time certificates of deposit bearing a reasonable rate of
  interest in any such depositary.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">

  <td width="3%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.42%;">

  </td>
  <td width="3%" valign="bottom" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:3.72%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:1.0pt;">&nbsp;</font></p>
  </td>
  <td width="92%" valign="top" style="padding:0in 0in 0in 0in;width:92.88%;">
  <p style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-indent:0in;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">To borrow
  from anyone, with the administrator&#146;s approval, such sum or sums from time to
  time as the trustee considers desirable to carry out this trust, and to
  mortgage or pledge all or part of the trust fund as security.</font></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman">&nbsp;</font></p>

<p align="center" style="margin:0in 0in .0001pt;text-align:center;"><font size="2" face="Times New Roman" style="font-size:10.0pt;">3</font></p>
